condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Budget Allocation | Description :Uttarakhand, shall take necessary and appropriate actions to ensure thatadequate budgetary allocations are: (a) included in its budget for annual counterpart funds and (b) transferred to the UttarakhandHealth and Family Welfare Society (UKHFWS) in a timely manner in accordance with the project'€™s annual work plans. | Frequency:CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Monitoring Agent | Description :UKHFWS shall not later than twelve (12) months after the effective date, employ,and maintain throughout project implementation, an independent monitoring and verification agent, under terms of reference and withqualifications and experience acceptable to the IDA to assist the UKHFWS to carry out verification of medical insurance claims andrelated performance audits on a quarterly basis for purposes of the project. | Due Date :01-Apr-2018

Finance Agreement :Project Financial Audit | Description :The Recipient shall, or shall cause the State of Uttarakhand to, have theProjectâ€™s Financial Statements audited in accordance with the provisions of Section 4.09 (b) of the General Conditions. Eachaudit shall cover the period of one (1) fiscal year of the Recipient, and shall be furnished to the Association not later than nine(9) months after the end of such period. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Safeguards | Description :Uttarakhand shall carry out the project in accordance with the Environmental andSocial Management Plan, as detailed in Section I.D of the Schedule to the Project Agreement. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Staffing | Description :Uttarakhand shall ensure that, at all times during Project implementation, the projectteam shall be headed by a Project director, an additional Project director and adequately staffed with professional andadministrative staff (includ.procurement, financial management, environmental, social and Project related technical staff), withthe necessary experience & qualifications acceptable to IDA. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Steering Committee | Description :UKHFWS shall maintain, at all times during project implementation, a projectsteering committee, headed by either the principal secretary or secretary of medical, health and family welfare, which shallcomprise secretaries and deputy secretaries from stakeholder departments, vested with the responsibility of, among others,providing strategic direction to the project. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Timely Payment | Description :Uttarakhand shall ensure that all payments due for public-private-partnership(PPP) contracts under Part 1 of the project are fully paid within ninety (90) days from the date said payment become eligible. |Frequency :CONTINUOUS
